Description:
Character and charm
This character filled cottage has all the charm necessary for comfort in a holiday or permanent home. Located a short walk to the pristine north facing Red Rocks Beach and a short drive to the CBD of Cowes, work has already been done, move in and enjoy.
Consisting of three bedrooms, one central bathroom, large open plan living/dining/ kitchen area with quality fit out, exposed polished floor boards, reverse cycle air conditioning and a pergola with pot belly stove (create a winter hideaway). CCTV gives you the peace of mind when you are not close by.
Extra special features include an Electric vehicle car charger and NBN is connected.

Description:
Stylish Single Level In Central Cowes
This recently renovated stylish 2 bedroom property is perfectly located in central Cowes, walking distance to beach and Thompson Avenue.
Situated in a quiet street, but so close to all the action, it would make the perfect holiday escape, permanent home or a savvy addition to your investment portfolio.
With an open plan living, kitchen, dining that is cleverly connected to the outdoor entertaining deck via modern timber bi-fold doors, makes it perfect for entertaining.
Fantastic natural light fills the home, creating a bright and inviting space. And split system heating cooling has been installed to provide year round comfort.
A functional floor plan also comprises, 2 toilets, family bathroom, separate laundry and 2 generous bedrooms complete with built in robes.
Outside you will find low maintenance surrounds with sufficient off street parking for 2 cars, and a garden shed for storing tools/ bikes or surf boards.
This immaculate property will not disappoint upon inspection. Contact us today!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
OPPORTUNITY AWAITS CLOSE TO TOWN
This superb property has endless opportunities with a dynamic layout that will suit many people and buying criteria. It is currently in dual use as a family residence and a successful B&B.
Located on a spacious allotment of approximately 1150m2 you will find two dwellings with landscaped garden surrounds. To the rear of the property you will find the self-contained bungalow with open floor plan with kitchenette and ensuite. This is adjoined to an extensive garage/workshop area with a second laundry. The other dwelling consists of the main residence and another self-contained unit with open plan living kitchen & dining room complete with separate bedroom and ensuite.
From the north facing alfresco area of beautiful merbau decking you will enter into the open plan kitchen dining room in the centre of the home with 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and premium fittings. Off this room leads to the oversized lounge room and flowing into another private bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite. Then following towards the other end of the home you will find 3 additional bedrooms with one of these set up for rental or guests with it's own private entrance and ensuite.
In total this beautiful home with its 6 bedrooms 5 bathrooms in a prime location has plenty of options for most buyers.
Call Alex Scott Cowes 5952 2633 to arrange your private inspection.
Insights: 170 THOMPSON AVENUE, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Space and privacy
Situated in the popular Seagrove Estate is this modern and contemporary single level home awaiting its new owner.
Spacious in design the residence comprises an open plan living, kitchen and dining area, three bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master is complete with walk in robe & ensuite.
The expansive and partially undercover entertainment deck extends off the main living space via stacking doors and overlooks the established yet low maintenance surrounds.
Offering a host of additional features including two split system heating and cooling units, tiles and carpet throughout, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen, ample storage, garden shed, water tank, double garage and side access for trailer/boat.
All of this is set within a 621sqm approx. fully fenced allotment and is a short distance to the Town Centre and local beaches.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Phillip Island.

Description:
Fantastic Location- In the Heart of Cowes
This solid two storey home is in a fantastic location, in a quiet street, only 500 metres to Cowes North facing beaches and 670 metres to the main shopping strip.
Situated on a generous 781 square metre allotment, the upstairs area features a sunny living room that opens onto a North facing deck, separate dining area, spacious kitchen with wall oven, electric hotplate/grill, dishwasher and plenty of storage space.
Three bedrooms all with built in robes and bathroom with separate toilet. The upstairs area has two reverse cycle split system air conditioning units.
Downstairs comprises of a family/ rumpus room, large bedroom with built in robes, laundry, shower room and separate toilet with a feature staircase.
Other features include a double car space under the deck, fully fenced yard and garden shed. The property would make the ideal holiday home or investment property and with its central location and proximity to beach, it will see excellent capital growth over time. Call today to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Petite Retreat
Located in an established and peaceful part of Cowes is this single level home, perfect for those looking to extend their investment portfolio, purchase a holiday home or permanent residence. A main feature of this home is its fantastic location, being within 1.2km (approx.) to the popular Red Rocks Road beach and a short drive to the Cowes shopping precinct.
The home comprises of two living areas, four bedrooms and two bathrooms and features a great undercover, paved entertainment area at the rear which overlooks the low maintenance surrounds.
Other great features include combustion heating, split system heating and cooling, gas cooktop and electric oven, solar panels, double garage with electric door, three large water tanks and garden shed.
All of this is set within a fully fenced 605sqm approx. allotment, don't miss this opportunity to secure a neat and tidy home in Cowes.

Description:
Lavish luxury for the whole family!
Presenting you with a superb opportunity to create your new Island lifestyle in a private and family friendly surround is this single level home oozing charm and sophistication!
Spanning across 38sq (approximately) is this spacious and contemporary floor plan. You will be immediately impressed with the soaring ceilings and quality fixtures and fittings.
Offering three bedrooms complete with walk in robes and ensuites, there is also a potential fourth bedroom that could also be utilised as a study.
The well appointed and chic kitchen is practical in design and is complimented by a stainless steel Smeg 900mm gas cooktop and electric oven, stainless steel Miele dishwasher, walk in pantry, stone benchtops with waterfall ends and a breakfast servery bar with bi-fold windows for bringing the outdoors in.
Stacking doors from the living and dining space lead you out to the undercover entertainment deck overlooking the private and landscaped surrounds. This area is finished with cafe blinds, ideal for year round enjoyment.
In addition to all of this, there is also a second living area that adjoins the garage and could be converted into a home office/theatre room/bedroom or games room.
Other great features include: polished timber floors, carpet and tiles throughout, salt water and solar heated swimming pool, double-glazed windows, four split system heating and cooling units, gas fire place, HRV system, solar panels, 2 phase power, 25,000L water tanks, surround sound network, double gates to the fire access track, garden shed and an irrigation system.
The double garage is large in size and could easily accommodate for boat or caravan and has a mezzanine floor with room for extra storage. There is also a single roller door to the rear.
All of this is set within a lush 918sqm (approx.) fully fenced allotment and is less than a 1km (approx.) walk along the adjacent access track to the beach. This home is also only a short drive into Cowes.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Dare To Dream
Ideally located and set perfectly in central Cowes. Catch the Vline from Melbourne and walk to your new holiday home, as when you're here you will not need the car. With only a 350m approx walk to beach access and just under 1km to Thompson Ave with your choice of Cafes, Restaurants and plenty of other shops to keep you busy all weekend.
This two story home comprises three bedrooms, two bathrooms. Upstairs you will find the master bedroom with ensuite, separate living with kitchenette and wrap around deck with a gorgeous panoramic coastal outlook over the tree tops to the Bay.
Downstairs comprising open plan kitchen, with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, dining and living, 2 bedrooms with family bathroom and large laundry, and deck to landscaped gardens. Split system heating/cooling both upstairs and down stairs will keep you cool and warm when it counts.
Homes in this location do not last long in this market. Please call to confirm open for inspections are going ahead, due to high demand of quality homes.

Description:
Position Position Position!
A very pretty house is awaiting a new owner! Situated in a quiet street just moments from the main street of Cowes and just a five minute walk to the beach. The perfect lifestyle property awaits you. Enter the house and discover polished floor boards and big windows, a fireplace in the lounge and a split system. Two bedrooms each with built in robes are to the left of the hallway. A large kitchen and meals area has a servery to the lounge. Two further rooms have options for the new purchaser - bedrooms, sun room, office? A bathroom has a pretty basin and shower with separate toilet.
The backyard is private and well planted and there is a small garage for storage.
Position perfect and offering the astute purchaser the opportunity to renovate without over capitalising.

Description:
COMPLETE PACKAGE
Perfect for the downsize or the first home buyer!
Recently renovated sparing no expense.
This central Island home comprises three large bedrooms with built in robes, new carpet and new drapes.
A modern and new central family bathroom, large open plan living and dining open out to the alfresco area is a dream for all family gatherings and entertaining.
The brand-new kitchen boasting a contemporary style island bench and plenty of cupboard space.
This amazing home is located so close to all that Cowes has to offer, including shopping amenities, schools, sporting facilities, public transport, cafes and restaurants.
Built on a generous allotment of approx. 677square meters which is fenced and a carport with plenty of room for parking a boat or caravan and separate is a lock up garage.

Description:
16m Frontage - Shoalhaven Vacant Land
Situated in an elevated position in the Shoalhaven Estate, off Justice Road in Cowes, this 480sqm approx allotment is the ideal location to build your holiday, permanent or investment property. A 16m frontage makes this the perfect place allotment to build your new dream home or holiday house.
Positioned at the end of a private cul de sac, this block will give you a privacy, and eliminate the need for drive through or passing traffic.
Only 1.4kms to the north facing sheltered bay beach, and a 5 minute drive away from Thompson Avenue- where you can enjoy a wide selection of cafes, restaurants and retail shops.
Connections available:-
Sewer
Water
Electricity
NBN
Due for title release late 2019 / early 2020.
Contact us today for more information.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Best of Both Worlds!
Overlooking the Sixth fairway and situated only 300 metres from the pristine north facing Cowes beach, whether you're a golfer, beach goer or both, this is a rare opportunity in such an exclusive area.
The solidly built brick veneer residence comprises spacious open plan living, along with a light filled second living/sunroom, three bedrooms and one bathroom.
Additional features include split system heating/cooling, timber lined cathedral ceilings with exposed beams to living area, single garage with direct access
All set on a lovely low maintenance 745sqm approx allotment the property is ideal to utilise now and renovate/develop at a later date.

Description:
Where nature meets the sea.
Capturing spectacular views of Westernport Bay out to the headland of the Peninsula, this stunningly presented home on a beautiful landscaped 3002 square metre allotment delivers coastal living at it's finest. Enjoy magnificent sunsets over Ventnor Beach and Flinders Headland and bask in the tranquility of this serene location, situated moments from the pristine Red Rocks bay beach.
Entering into this stunning property you are greeted with a circular driveway sweeping into the double carport surrounded by natural landscaping and wildlife. Awash with natural light, this exceptional home commands an elevated position which provides the perfect vantage point to enjoy the far-reaching views. Large windows frame the stunning vista in the open-plan living/dining area which flows onto a balcony that captures the sea breeze. The kitchen comes complete with an electric oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher, and walk in pantry. To complete the second level you will find the large master bedroom boasting beautiful bay views with walk in robe, gas log fire in the living zone and extensive decking which captures the magnificent sunsets.
Downstairs comprises of the second living area with direct access to the covered alfresco area with spa, four generous bedrooms with built in robes, another large bedroom or sunroom, two bathrooms, plus a separate toilet and laundry.
The outdoor spaces will continue to impress, with the botanical landscaping, large gazebo perfect for entertaining on the beautiful balmy nights and large shedding hidden toward the back of the property.
Additional features of this already magnificent home include evaporative cooling, under stair storage, stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop, walk in pantry, gas heating, ample room for boat/caravan/jetski storage and minutes' walk to the famous family friendly Red Rocks bay beach.
You will need to inspect this property to take in all it has to offer!
Insights: 12-14 Red Rocks Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019.
